law.catch_line: "Park" means to halt a vehicle, whether or not it is occupied, other than temporarily:...
law.text:
"Park" means to halt a vehicle, whether or not it is occupied, other than temporarily:
When necessary to avoid conflict with other traffic or in compliance with the directions of a police officer or a traffic control device; or
For the purpose of and while actually engaged in loading or unloading property or passengers.
